system.description:
What is the best defense? Armor? No. The key to avoiding a messy death in the field, as you learned early, is to stay low, stay mobile, and stay fast. Your mech reflects this philosophy: light, quick, bristling with force-multiplying weapons. You live to push your machine beyond expected parameters, shaking target locks and incoming fire while keeping your own targeting true.

Rank I: Integrated Chaff Launchers

At the start of your turn, you gain soft cover. You lose this cover if you attack or force another character to make a save.

Rank II: Lockbreaker

Before or after you SKIRMISH (including as a reaction, e.g. from OVERWATCH), you may move 2 spaces. This movement ignores engagement and doesn't provoke reactions.

Rank III: Weave

The first attack taken as a reaction against you in any round automatically misses.
